message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $20000. This is a great deal, considering its true value to me is at least $15000. Let me know if you're interested!

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value you place on the product, but my budget is limited. I would like to propose a price of $15000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations. Looking forward to your response.

Hi Bob, thank you for your counteroffer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $15000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $18000. This is still a great deal, considering its value to me is at least $15000. Let me know if this is something you'd be interested in.

Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your flexibility. Based on my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $16000 for the product. I hope this is within your considerations. Looking forward to your response.

Hi Bob, thank you for your latest offer. I'm still not willing to go as low as $16000. I'm willing to compromise further and offer the product to you for $17500. This is my final offer, and I hope you'll consider it. If not, I'll have to consider other options.

Hello Alice, thank you for your final offer. I've carefully considered my budget and am willing to offer $17000 for the product. I hope this proposal is acceptable. If not, I understand and will consider purchasing the product from John.

Hi Bob, I'm surprised you're willing to go up to $17000! I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $17250. This is my last offer, and I hope you'll consider it. If not, I'll have to sell the product to John.
